name: Minor Problem
description:
This game was created in around 12 hours for the Global Game Jam 2015

Two player co-operative game where two children dress up as a grown man in order to purchase alcohol.

The movement is controlled by managing the center of balance - the balance of player two (who is "the head") can not lose or win the game on their own, but does impact on the balance of player one (the "legs").

Player two should aim to keep their balance central so as to avoid harming player 1. Player 1 should direct their balance in the direction they want to go. If player 1's balance is too far off-center then they will drop the coat and be caught.

You must go right through the supermarket, get the alcohol, and go back to the door to win.

Lower scores are better.
